subject: Basketball
Private and Sectarian Schools
Jews and Judaism
Interscholastic Athletics
lead_paragraph: Houston’s Robert M. Beren Academy, which successfully appealed a scheduling conflict that nearly forced it to forfeit its place in the state tournament, lost in the championship game on Saturday night.
snippet: Houston’s Robert M. Beren Academy, which successfully appealed a scheduling conflict that nearly forced it to forfeit its place in the state tournament, lost in the championship game on Saturday night.
